list.name: WALKING-CANE
list.description: Gray's next hit from the Finger Pistol shoots a walking cane which pulls enemies back by a bit.
list.descriptionHtml: Gray's next hit from the Finger Pistol shoots a walking cane which pulls enemies back by a bit.

list.name: GRAND-PIANO
list.description: Gray's next hit from the Finger Pistol will also leave a target on the ground where a piano will land and hurt enemies. It would be too bad if someone would get hurt, right?
list.descriptionHtml:
Gray's next hit from the Finger Pistol will also leave a target on the ground where a piano will land and hurt enemies.
It would be too bad if someone would get hurt, right?
